data.author: Idries Shah
data.quote: Enlightenment must come little by little - otherwise it would overwhelm.

data.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
data.quote: To observe without evaluating is the highest form of intelligence.

data.author: Epictetus
data.quote: We are disturbed not by what happens to us, but by our thoughts about what happens.

data.author: Erich Fromm
data.quote: Man's main task in life is to give birth to himself.

data.author: Frederick Buechner
data.quote: Listen to your life. All moments are key moments.

data.author: Lourdes Cortes Garcia
data.quote: Moments, moments, that is what life is all about.

data.author: Unknown
data.quote: Every single person you meet in your life, is for the right reason in the right moment.

data.author: Tom Hanks
data.quote: It's supposed to be hard. If it wasn't hard, everyone would do it. The hard is what makes it great.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: I have no special talents. I am only passionately curious.

data.author: Samuel Beckett
data.quote: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better.

data.author: Coach Jae
data.quote: The most intense fight a person will ever have is between the person they are and the person they are capable of becoming.

data.author: T.E. Lawrence
data.quote: All men dream, but not equally. Those who dream by night in the dusty recesses of their minds wake in the day to find that it was vanity; but the dreamers of the day are dangerous men, for they may act their dreams with open eyes, to make it possible.

data.author: George Addair
data.quote: Everything you want is on the other side of fear.

data.author: Babe Ruth
data.quote: Never let the fear of striking out get in your way.

data.author: Elon Musk
data.quote: I could either watch it happen, or be a part of it.

data.author: Karim Seddiki
data.quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.

data.author: Rushton Herley
data.quote: The only person you need to compare yourself with is who you were yesterday.

data.author: Socrates
data.quote: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.

data.author: Arthur Ashe
data.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.

data.author: Dorian Yates
data.quote: If you're comfortable, you're not going to put yourself through the extreme pressure and pain to change your life.
